${ModID}:FrontloadedBash.NAME: Frontloaded Bash
${ModID}:FrontloadedBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 more damage for every !M! cards in your draw pile.
${ModID}:FrontloadedBash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 more damage for every !M! cards in your draw pile.

${ModID}:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
${ModID}:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Skill card. NL Add copy of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Preparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Skill card. NL Add copy of that card into your hand.

${ModID}:SmallAdaptation.NAME: Small Adaptation
${ModID}:SmallAdaptation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose a non-Power card that costs 1 or 0. NL Add a copy of that card into your hand.

${ModID}:ExperimentalMerge.NAME: Experimental Merge
${ModID}:ExperimentalMerge.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:ExhaustiveWork.NAME: Exhaustive Work
${ModID}:ExhaustiveWork.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Choose a card. NL Exhaust that card and add a copy of it to your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to Exhaust and copy.

${ModID}:IterativeDesign.NAME: Iterative Design
${ModID}:IterativeDesign.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card created this combat or *Duplicate a card, gain  !M! Block.

${ModID}:ReduceOverhead.NAME: Reduce Overhead
${ModID}:ReduceOverhead.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL cards that have duplicates. NL Deal !D! damage for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MagicHand.NAME: Magic Hand
${ModID}:MagicHand.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! cards from your master deck to add to your hand. NL It exhausts. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MagicHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! cards from your master deck to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EnergyDrink.NAME: Energy Drink
${ModID}:EnergyDrink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! stslib:Temporary_HP. NL Gain 1 ${ModID}:Duplication for every 10 cards you shuffle into your draw pile.
